Title: The Blackout, Part 1: Tragedy Porn
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin, David Handelman (story editor)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: To salvage their ratings, the news team decides to lead with lurid criminal trial coverage at the expense of more worthy stories like the debt ceiling debate.
